thread.title: Alan Branch
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Alan Branch

author: Alan Branch
title: Alan Branch
text: We have extremely hard water in the northern part of my state. At my previous house we suffered for years with mineral build-up on all pots and surfaces. We've had Pelican full water softener and filtration system on our house since we moved in 5-years ago and we couldn't be more pleased. We don't have a fraction of the mineral build-up and the water just tastes better. I recommend this product to everyone.
